title: So Long For Now, Summer - Novel Updates
tags: Aggressive Characters   Arranged Marriage   Award-winning Work   Clingy Lover   Complex Family Relationships   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Jealousy   Loneliness   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Office Romance   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Pregnancy   R-18   Tragic Past   Unrequited Love
author: Kim Chacha   김차차
description:
“Let’s get a divorce.”

The child was gone, and we were back to square one.

No matter how much I loved Woo Jin-ha, I didn’t have to do anything s*upid anymore.>
